title: Saving masteries during champ select
body: Client crashed on me several times. Anyone else ?

replies.body:
Yes I've had a mastery page be "corrupt" before which can be very annoying, how to fix it is go to your mastery page (Not while in champ select) you will be preselected on your corrupted mastery page, don't delete the page first remove all mastery points in the page manually click "save". Then delete the page, this should remove the corrupted mastery page. (I would try this first so you don't have to remove all the mastery pages:P)

Hope it works ^_^

This is pretty rare, but most of the time when I've seen this issue, it's caused by one or more Mastery page being corrupt. The common solution is to delete all of your mastery pages, relog, then create them from scratch again. It only takes a few minutes and should resolve the issue. 

Let me know if it worked!
